__inputs.description: Prometheus server that connects to Flyte
__inputs.label: Prometheus
__inputs.name: DS_PROM

description: Flyte User Dashboard. It's designed to give an overview of execution status and resource consumption.

panels.title: Successful wf execution duration by quantile
Failed wf execution duration by quantile
CPU Limit vs requested by namespace
Memory limit vs requested by namespace (MiB)

targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending"} * on(pod) group_left(label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{label_workflow_name=~"$workflow"}) by (namespace, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) > 0
targets.query: sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending"} * on(pod) group_left(label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{label_workflow_name=~"$workflow"}) by (namespace, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) > 0

targets.expr: (100 * (max(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!=""} * on(pod) group_left(label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{namespace=~"$project-$domain",label_workflow_name=~"$workflow"} * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) / max(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{container!=""} * on(pod) group_left(label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name))) > 0
targets.query: (100 * (max(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!=""} * on(pod) group_left(label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{namespace=~"$project-$domain",label_workflow_name=~"$workflow"} * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) / max(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{container!=""} * on(pod) group_left(label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name))) > 0

targets.expr: (100 * (sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!=""}[2m]) * on(pod) group_left(label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{namespace=~"$project-$domain",label_workflow_name=~"$workflow"} * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{container!=""} * on(pod) group_left(label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name))) > 0
targets.query: (100 * (sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!=""}[2m]) * on(pod) group_left(label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{namespace=~"$project-$domain",label_workflow_name=~"$workflow"} * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{container!=""} * on(pod) group_left(label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name))) > 0

title: Flyte User Dashboard (via Prometheus)
